job_tasks.phrase: Building software applications by using relevant development languages and applying knowledge of systems, services and tools appropriate for the business area
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the act of creating software applications, which is the core of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Being responsible for a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and act accordingly when violated
job_tasks.justification: This describes end-to-end service ownership, including monitoring health and performance, which are key MLOps activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify and resolve live production issues by mitigating the customer impact within SLA
job_tasks.justification: Resolving production issues and mitigating customer impact within Service Level Agreements (SLAs) are core operational responsibilities in an MLOps context.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, technology requirements and emerging technologies
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating architecture solutions, considering technical and business requirements, is a fundamental aspect of software development planning and design.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying opportunities for process, system and structural improvements (i.e performance gains) by examining and evaluating current process flows, methods and standards
job_tasks.justification: This points to the continuous improvement of systems and processes, a common software development practice to enhance performance and efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: Delivering clear, well-structured, and significant information to a target audience by using suitable communication mediums and language tailored to the audience
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the skill of communicating information effectively to different audiences.

soft_skills.phrase: Delivering clear, well-structured, and significant information to a target audience by using suitable communication mediums and language tailored to the audience
Identify and resolve live production issues
Being responsible for a service end to end

classification.rationale: The job description mentions "GenAI project - The Trip Planner" but lacks specific technical details or tasks related to generative AI models. The majority of the listed tasks and responsibilities align with general software development and operations engineering, rather than specialized ML or GenAI engineering.
